author: mirichmo
body: This issue arose out of PR #4061. The tests should be ported so we have coverage of that area of the code.

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: Note that I have updated the Pester.Commands.Cmdlets.CatalogTests.ps1 file to cover the fix of #4061, so we need to be sure to port from the RS3 branch that has this update.

title: Port Catalog Signing Tests to GitHub
